name: Gert Talnin
content:
Colonel Gert Talnin was an Imperial officer in charge of the Bestine starport on Tatooine. All incoming and outgoing space travel had to be authorized by him.
Talnin owed Wlinc Tchrr  money from gambling bets. He unsuccessfully tried to pay his debt with travel vouchers, which Tchrr didn't accept.
Colonel Gert Talnin is a Non-Player Character  in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and can be found in front of the Bestine starport.
